Property: name of header field used by PRA
Value:
value of header field used by PRA after removing comments and parts 
        not authenticated

The MIME body part reference that contains the S/MIME signature.  
      See [Section 3.2.1 of RFC7281] for full syntax.

The email address [RFC5322] associated with the 
      S/MIME signature. The email address can be specified explicitly or derived 
      from the identity of the signer. Note that this email address can correspond 
      to a countersignature.

serialNumber of the certificate associated with the S/MIME signature 
      (see Section 4.1.2.2 of [RFC5280]).

Issuer name DN (e.g., "CN=CA1,ST=BC,c=CA") of the certificate 
      associated with the S/MIME signature (see section 4.1.2.2 of  
      [RFC5280]).
envelope sender after removing parts not authenticated
HELO/EHLO value
DNS domain name used as the subject of a VBR query
DNS domain name of the entity acting as the voucher
